info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 02 at 6:59PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Scattered showers with isolated thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Stillwater, western Sweet Grass and central Park Counties, with bursts of heavy snow through 800 PM MDT... At 655 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered showers and isolated thunderstorms around Livingston, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...These strong showers will produce bursts of heavy snow, which will dramatically lower visibility for brief periods and cause slick roads with a slushy snow accumulation. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Visibility could be reduced below a mile in spots, with roads becoming slick. Locations impacted include... Livingston, Big Timber, Clyde Park, Pine Creek, Springdale, Mc Leod and Wilsall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
